Uses of Class
babble.net.NetworkBuffer

  • Packages that use NetworkBuffer 
    Package Description
    babble.net
    Network layer of asynchrnous communication.
    babble.net.http
    Asynchrnous HTTP protocol.
    babble.net.json
    Asynchrnous JSON-RPC protocol.

    • Uses of NetworkBuffer in babble.net

      Subclasses of NetworkBuffer in babble.net 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Request
      A request carries input data required execute an operation.
      class  Response
      A response at network level is simply an array of bytes.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeBytes(byte[] bytes)
      Writes the given array of bytes.
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeCRLF() 
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeInt(int value)
      Writes the given integer value
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeLong(long value)
      Writes the given long value
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeStream(InputStream in)
      Writes the content of given input stream in chunks.
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeStream(Path path)
      Writes the content of given path in chunk encoding.
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeString(Charset encoding, String... values)
      Writes the given strings.
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeString(String... values) 
      protected NetworkBuffer NetworkBuffer.writeStringInChunks(String s)
